desc: Organic and natural hair care online. We only use cruelty free hair products with recyclable or compostable packaging across all of our products. We believe in natural hair products that use essential oils and botanical ingredients that are good for all hair types. We do not use products that could cause harm.

layout.text:
Our aim at earth organic shop is to provide you with professional, cruelty free and vegan haircare.
Our products are sourced from certified companies that we trust and work with everyday in our salon. Earth Organic Hairdressing.
Shop in confidence.
Shop ethically.
